None.Name: Tainted Global Revive
None.Description: Casts a hex on every unit in the current game that will make it ressurect after 3 seconds if it dies within 15 seconds. Revived creatures are able to deal 50% more damage but they will irrevocably die after 30 seconds. Affected units cannot be killed by the player. Reusable every 30 seconds.
